com.quorum.tessera.argon2

Interface Argon2

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Argon2Impl

    public interface Argon2
    Provides hashing functions using the Argon2 algorithms Validation of various inputs is left to the implementor, although the validation should be consistent amongst implementations. (i.e. the same inputs should work for any implementation)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Argon2 create() 
      ArgonResult hash(ArgonOptions options, String password, byte[] salt)
      Hash the password using the provided options
      ArgonResult hash(String password, byte[] salt)
      Hash the password using the given salt and some default options

    • Method Detail

      • hash

        ArgonResult hash(ArgonOptions options,
                 String password,
                 byte[] salt)
        Hash the password using the provided options
        Parameters:
        options - the custom options to call Argon2 with
        password - the password to hash
        salt - the salt to apply when hashing
        Returns:
        the result which contains the output, as well as the input parameters

      • hash

        ArgonResult hash(String password,
                 byte[] salt)
        Hash the password using the given salt and some default options
        Parameters:
        password - the password to hash
        salt - the salt to apply when hashing
        Returns:
        the result which contains the output, as well as the input parameters

        static Argon2 create()
